ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: as for the tentacle whip it is a 5dmg 28 del plus lifetap the bloodclaw i believe is 5dmg 23-25del the Barded (which i am dual wielding) are 7dmg and 28del...i
ygData.messageBody:
as for the tentacle whip it is a 5dmg 28 del plus lifetap
the bloodclaw i believe is 5dmg 23-25del
the Barded (which i am dual wielding) are 7dmg and 28del...i am level 28 and
i hit for 20 with them...my strength is 106 with items and 140
with str buff and anthem de arms from a group mate

the whips u can get from najena both tentacle and barbed

Hope this helps

Genadarilo of Povar
Hail The Hawk Empire



>From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Magical Weapon
>Date: Thu, 24 Jun 1999 13:23:51 -0500
>
>From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>
>For my warrior I purchased some magical weapons. I purchased a Tentacle
>whip (4, 25) for 25 plat and a Dragoon Dirk (6,23) for 45 plat. The
>tentacle whip isn't all that great, but I've got it on my secondary hand,
>and occasionally it casts lifetap. I'd like something better that still
>has
>a fast delay and still does magic damage, but haven't found anything yet.
>There is a barbed leather whip that does (6,25) i think, but it sells for
>around 200 plat.
>
>Trent Carroll
> Programmer
